name: Sport Car Simulator 3D
description:
Sport Car Simulator - From authors of Offroad Car Simulator!!! New 3D car simulator – sport edition!!!

Game is created to bring realistic sport car 3D experience on mobile devices. Car simulator comes with 9 different vehicles, true 3D physics, professional car control system!

Mission Types:
1.Checkpoints – city car simulator levels where you need to complete checkpoints driving inside big city
2.Racing – in this kind of levels just follow the road, be fast and attentive
3.Laps – car simulator includes PRO sport tracks, which will bring real sport car driving feelings
4.Jump - enjoy real car jumping experiences, show high level driving skills.

Car simulator includes various environments, tracks, roads to drive and feel the car. Also there are 3 seasons for environment: winter mountains, spring on highlands, desert summer.

Game includes 3 type of controls: gyroscope, steering wheel, buttons.
